content: {"name": "Neighborhood House Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "New clients have to go to neighborhood house  Main office to get register address is :1720 S Livernois RdRochester Hills, MI 48307, USA Contact:  2486515836 https://www.ranh.org/client-services\n\nServing: Rochester Hills, Auburn Hills, ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ranh.org/food-pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1315 North Pine Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Rochester Hills", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48307", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.6919755, "longitude": -83.1375195}, "phones": [{"number": "(248) 656-4904", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}]}
